text: A uan roroaba ko Samarian mɨdorozir gumazibar damazimɨn a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Judan gumazir amɨraghmɨrazir kaba tizim damuasa? Me ti ghaze, me nguibar ekiar kam uam anesaragham? Me ti ghaze, me uan God bagh ua ofabar amuam, a? Me ti ghaze, me Dɨpenir kamɨn ingarigh dughiar vamɨran aven anegɨvagham? Me ti ghaze, me fomɨra isizir bizibar pozibar tongɨn, dagɨaba inigh ua dar dɨvazir aghuimɨn ingaram?”
